name: Abandoned (SizlStudios)
description:
Your name is Carlos, a news reporter trying to find a good story for a promotion. You find a golden story of an abandoned asylum that's rumored to have dead bodies in the basement. But be warned, you are not alone in this asylum, you may have your camera, but all you can do is run and hide.

Release Date:UNKNOWN(This Summer)
Genre:HORROR
Company:SizlStudios

I WOULD RECOMMEND FOLLOWING THIS GAME SO YOU GET NOTIFIED WHEN ITS RELEASED
